message: Let's be fair, Bob. I understand time is of the essence, so I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It benefits us both to settle this quickly.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I believe a 60/40 split in my favor is fairer, considering the time constraints and the diminishing value of the money for you. Let's reach a mutually agreeable solution before it's too late.
Bob, I understand your position, but I need to look out for my own interests as well.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor. This is a compromise, and it's important we reach an agreement soon.
